languages.text: {n}Паскаль взирает на вас с уважением. Похоже, он удивлен, что вы распознали назначение вживленных в его тело аугментаций.{/n} "К тебе Омниссия тоже был щедр. Он даровал тебе понимание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль взирает на вас с уважением. Похоже, он удивлен, что вы распознали назначение вживленных в его тело аугментаций.{/n} "К тебе Омниссия тоже был щедр. Он даровал тебе понимание".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль взирает на вас с уважением. Похоже, он удивлен, что вы распознали назначение вживленных в его тело аугментаций.{/n} "К тебе Омниссия тоже был щедр. Он даровал тебе понимание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal looks at you with respect. He appears to be surprised that you recognized the purpose of the augmentations grafted into his body.{/n} "Omnissiah was generous to you, too. He granted you understanding."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal looks at you with respect. He appears to be surprised that you recognized the purpose of the augmentations grafted into his body.{/n} "Omnissiah was generous to you, too. He granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看着你，眼神中带着敬意，似乎很惊讶你能理解这些植入物的目的。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚对你也很慷慨，祂赐予了你理解能力。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看着你，眼神中带着敬意，似乎很惊讶你能理解这些植入物的目的。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚对你也很慷慨，祂赐予了你理解能力。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te mira con respeto. Parece sorprendido de que reconozcas la finalidad de los aumentos implantados en su cuerpo.{/n} «El Omnissiah también ha sido generoso con usted, dándole comprensión».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te mira con respeto. Parece sorprendido de que reconozcas la finalidad de los aumentos implantados en su cuerpo.{/n} «El Omnissiah también ha sido generoso con usted, dándole comprensión».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは敬意をもったまなざしであなたを見ている。彼は、あなたが彼の体に埋め込まれたオーグメティックの目的を理解していることに驚いているようだ。{/n}「万機神はあなたにも寛大だった。彼はあなたに理解力を与えたようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは敬意をもったまなざしであなたを見ている。彼は、あなたが彼の体に埋め込まれたオーグメティックの目的を理解していることに驚いているようだ。{/n}「万機神はあなたにも寛大だった。彼はあなたに理解力を与えたようだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich voller Respekt an. Er wirkt überrascht, dass du den Zweck der Augmentationen verstehst, die in seinen Körper implantiert wurden.{/n} "Der Omnissiah war auch mit Euch großzügig. Er hat Euch Verständnis gewährt."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich voller Respekt an. Er wirkt überrascht, dass du den Zweck der Augmentationen verstehst, die in seinen Körper implantiert wurden.{/n} "Der Omnissiah war auch mit Euch großzügig. Er hat Euch Verständnis gewährt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vous regarde avec respect. Il semble surpris que vous reconnaissiez la fonction des augmentations implantées dans son corps.{/n} « L'Omnimessie s'est montré généreux envers vous également. Il vous a accordé la compréhension. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vous regarde avec respect. Il semble surpris que vous reconnaissiez la fonction des augmentations implantées dans son corps.{/n} « L'Omnimessie s'est montré généreux envers vous également. Il vous a accordé la compréhension. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sana saygıyla bakıyor. Bedenine yerleştirilmiş ogmentlerin amacını fark etmene şaşırmış görünüyor.{/n} "Hermesih size de cömert davranmış. Size anlayış ihsan etmiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you with respect. He seems surprised that you recognise the purpose of the augmentations implanted in his body.{/n} "The Omnissiah has been generous to you, too. He has granted you understanding."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sana saygıyla bakıyor. Bedenine yerleştirilmiş ogmentlerin amacını fark ettiğin için şaşırmış görünüyor.{/n} "Hermesih size de cömert davranmış. Size anlayış ihsan etmiş."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
